alert.note: Alert for Allen; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 7:38PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Putnam, southeastern Paulding, northern Van Wert and central Allen Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 738 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Van Wert, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Delphos and Ottoville around 750 PM EDT. Kalida around 755 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Elida, Lima, Columbus Grove and Pandora. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 124 and 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
